unixem/internal/util.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Internal utility header for the UNIXem API.

#include <unixem/unixem.h>

Go to the source code of this file.

#define NUM_ELEMENTS(x)   (sizeof(x) / sizeof(0[x]))
